field.name: summary
field.value: Implement reloading of the AppDomain when an assembly is modified

field.name: description
field.value: DynamicLoader facility manages AppDomains. When an assembly located on one of the managed directories is modified, DynLoader should load a new AppDomain and then dispose the old one, just like ASP.NET does.
